name: part_002
file: tmp_【#アキロゼ生誕祭2022】Wonder Shower Musical !!!!【3DLIVE】 [TsRo8VuubSk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal performs the song 'Ready Made'.
Aki Rosenthal and Amane Kanata perform 'Alice in Musicland'.

subtitles.original: ...とか変わらないわかってるんだよ I'm baby
subtitles.english: ...I know it doesn't change, I'm baby

subtitles.original: ありふれたモブなんだって
subtitles.english: Just a common mob

subtitles.original: 認めてないならいっそ猿真似叫んで
subtitles.english: If you won't admit it, just shout like a mimic monkey

subtitles.original: 威風堂々せいぜい空回りに
subtitles.english: Majestic at best, just spinning in circles

subtitles.original: 本音ばかりじゃ生きられない
subtitles.english: Can't live on true feelings alone

subtitles.original: 録画ビデオで凝る人生が
subtitles.english: A life spent fussing over recorded videos

subtitles.original: きっとお似合いだわ
subtitles.english: Surely suits you well

subtitles.original: もっと波なれば溶け込んで
subtitles.english: If you become more like waves, you'll blend in

subtitles.original: 金と愛情で踊るのさ
subtitles.english: Dancing for money and affection

subtitles.original: ワン・ツー・スリーで弾け飛んだ
subtitles.english: Bursting on 1, 2, 3

subtitles.original: 固定概念をバトる打って 到底 到底
subtitles.english: Battling fixed concepts, impossible, impossible

subtitles.original: 楽ならもう一回
subtitles.english: If it's easy, do it once more

subtitles.original: レディメイドの琴線に
subtitles.english: On the heartstrings of the ready-made

subtitles.original: 歪みかけてノイズ交じり 後悔 後悔
subtitles.english: Starting to distort, mixed with noise, regret, regret

subtitles.original: やめて黙ってよ
subtitles.english: Stop it, be quiet

subtitles.original: 下に乗った苦い感情 暴露ばかり吐き出して
subtitles.english: Venting out all the bitter emotions that were suppressed

subtitles.original: ダーティー ダーティー 言葉飲み込めばほら
subtitles.english: Dirty, dirty, if you swallow your words, look

subtitles.original: お利口回るようなんて 顔色伺ってるんだよ
subtitles.english: Like an obedient child, just watching the mood

subtitles.original: I'm baby 歪みだすバブなんだって
subtitles.english: I'm baby, just a distorting infant

subtitles.original: オーダーメイドのブランド 身に着けて威張って
subtitles.english: Boasting in order-made brands

subtitles.original: 舌を鳴らせば下世話に問う 不適合者は間違いさ
subtitles.english: If you click your tongue, the vulgar ones ask, being a misfit is a mistake

subtitles.original: かたかたかたかたひろぶって きっと楽なんだな
subtitles.english: Clinging to a rigid shell, it must be easy

subtitles.original: 社会居場所はどこですか
subtitles.english: Where is the place in society?

subtitles.original: 金も愛情もくそ食らえ
subtitles.english: To hell with money and affection

subtitles.original: ワン・ツー・スリーでくたばり飛んだ
subtitles.english: Dropped dead on 1, 2, 3

subtitles.original: 固定概念を真っ黒塗って どうだい どうだい
subtitles.english: Painting fixed concepts pitch black, how's that, how's that?

subtitles.original: 待っててもらっていろ
subtitles.english: Just wait for me

subtitles.original: レディメイドの艶美に
subtitles.english: In the beauty of the ready-made

subtitles.original: 解凍を掛けてノイズはじけ
subtitles.english: Unfreezing and bursting with noise

subtitles.original: 問題 問題 解かず歌ってよ
subtitles.english: Problem, problem, sing without solving it

subtitles.original: 塞ぎこんだ黒い感情 暴露ばかり吐き出して
subtitles.english: Venting out all the dark emotions that were pent up

subtitles.original: ねぇほらまた始まった
subtitles.english: Hey, look, it's started again

subtitles.original: 比較ばかりで飽きたんだ
subtitles.english: I'm tired of all the comparisons

subtitles.original: 大人になどはなりたくなんかないか
subtitles.english: I don't want to become an adult or anything

subtitles.original: 天邪鬼なら放っといて
subtitles.english: If you're perverse, just leave me alone

subtitles.original: 私 私 気付いたの
subtitles.english: I, I realized it

subtitles.original: ワン・ツー・スリーで弾け飛んだ
subtitles.english: Bursting on 1, 2, 3

subtitles.original: 固定概念をバトる打って 到底 到底
subtitles.english: Battling fixed concepts, impossible, impossible

subtitles.original: 楽ならもう一回
subtitles.english: If it's easy, do it once more

subtitles.original: レディメイドの琴線に
subtitles.english: On the heartstrings of the ready-made

subtitles.original: 歪みかけてノイズ交じり 後悔 後悔
subtitles.english: Starting to distort, mixed with noise, regret, regret

subtitles.original: やめて黙ってよ
subtitles.english: Stop it, be quiet

subtitles.original: ワン・ツー・スリーでくたばり飛んだ
subtitles.english: Dropped dead on 1, 2, 3

subtitles.original: 固定概念を真っ黒塗って どうだい どうだい
subtitles.english: Painting fixed concepts pitch black, how's that, how's that?

subtitles.original: 本当だえいと
subtitles.english: It's true

subtitles.original: レディメイドの艶美に
subtitles.english: In the beauty of the ready-made

subtitles.original: 解凍を掛けてノイズはじけ
subtitles.english: Unfreezing and bursting with noise

subtitles.original: 問題 問題 解かず歌ってよ
subtitles.english: Problem, problem, sing without solving it

subtitles.original: 下に乗った苦い感情 暴露ばかり吐き出して
subtitles.english: Venting out all the bitter emotions that were suppressed

subtitles.original: 迷い込んだ森の中 私をいざなう声が
subtitles.english: In the forest I strayed into, a voice beckons me

subtitles.original: 深い霧にこだまする 私の道はどっち
subtitles.english: Echoing through the thick mist, which way is my path?

subtitles.original: あっち そっち それともこっち? 有情不断な お嬢さん
subtitles.english: Over there, that way, or this way? Oh, indecisive young lady

subtitles.original: だけどそれは私も同じ あっちもそっちも 歩く道
subtitles.english: But it's the same for me, a path to walk both there and that way

subtitles.original: さあ 喜びや 悲しみや 愛しさまで
subtitles.english: Come, from joy, to sorrow, and even to love

subtitles.original: 形にしたいもの全部 塗り重ねていったら
subtitles.english: If I keep layering everything I want to give form to

subtitles.original: 最初にもとめていたものが 何かわからなくなって
subtitles.english: I'll lose sight of what I was looking for at first

subtitles.original: 最後に残されたものは
subtitles.english: And what is left at the end

subtitles.original: 透明な感情の音楽
subtitles.english: Is the music of transparent emotions

subtitles.original: 個性の残骸
subtitles.english: The wreckage of individuality
